column4: 2:30 p.m. to 5:30 p.m. - Three lanes outbound and one lane inbound.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: Inbound and outbound Alumni Dr - Right turns only onto Tates Creek Rd.

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
column4: Outbound traffic coming from Cooper Dr must turn left onto Alumni Dr.
Alumni Dr from the stadium to Tates Creek Rd.
Waller Ave from Nicholasville Dr to Harrodsburg Rd.
Cooper Dr from the stadium to Nicholasville Rd.
